not_found.description: Writable Volumes that were not found.
Writable Volumes that were not found.

error.description: Writable Volumes with errors during deletion attempt.

scheduled.description: Writable Volumes that were scheduled for deletion in background.

error_action.description: Whether failures related to the Writable Volume will prevent application related attachments. Setting "continue_silently" will skip attachments and not alert the user. Setting "continue_alert" will alert the end user that the writable was not attached. Setting "disable_and_alert" will disable all virtualization and display an alert. Setting "disable_and_alert_on_error" will disable all virtualization and display an alert only for error cases (conflicts due to multiple logins are not considered an error). Must set as "" if a) owner_type is "Computer" or b) block_login parameter is set to "1".

block_login.description: Whether failures related to the Writable Volume will prevent User login.

mount_prefix.description: Prefix used to determine whether the Writable Volume should mount to a particular Computer.

oses.description: IDs of operating systems the Writable Volume is allowed to mount to.

size_mb.description: Requested size for the Writable Volume(s) in MB used during expansion operations.

volumes.description: IDs of Writable Volumes to increase size for.

configured.description: Tells if App Volumes Manager is configured or not.

time_offset.description: The offset between the local timezone and UTC
